commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body:
* Add a new item and scope to list classes and any inheritance information.
* Let the default symbol list preference handle generic function definitions.
* Indent any functions contained within a class.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Scope interpolated strings as strings rather than keywords

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Do not scope the whitespace surrounding an operator

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Use keyword.control.end.* as the scope for all end keywords

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Match switch as a block including case and otherwise

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Match if as a block including elseif and else

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Match for and parfor as blocks

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Now a single rule for all functions. Matches input arguments, and splits output arguments into separate matches.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Get current line / selection via environment variables
commits.body:
The previous method does not work for me (and multiple other users) and based on an old post¹ to alt.comp.lang.applescript: “osascript closes stdin (file descriptor 0) multiple times (I used ktrace && kdump)”. Though a follow-up post does claim to successfully use osascript with stdin (in the same was as was previously done by this script).

¹ https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/alt.comp.lang.applescript/1v0s0Tkn1bM
